scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets -- -D warnings && cargo fmt || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'

BLOOIO_API_KEY.description: Blooio API key used to authenticate with the Blooio API

BLOOIO_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Public URL for receiving Blooio webhooks (e.g., https://your-domain.com/webhook)

BLOOIO_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Signing secret used to verify Blooio webhooks

BLOOIO_WEBHOOK_PORT.description: Port to run the webhook server on (default: 3001)

BLOOIO_WEBHOOK_PATH.description: Path to mount the webhook server (default: derived from BLOOIO_WEBHOOK_URL)

BLOOIO_FROM_NUMBER.description: E.164 number to send messages from (must be assigned to your org)

BLOOIO_TEST_CHAT_ID.description: Chat identifier to use for tests (phone, email, or group id)
